name: keyvex-aws-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for Keyvex Platform

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run build-lambdas && cdk deploy --all
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && npm run build-lambdas && cdk deploy --all --context environment=development
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && npm run build-lambdas && cdk deploy --all --context environment=production
